name: angularjs-cli
description: AngularJS CLI to create ES2015/TS driven projects and manage components

scripts.build: mkdirp bin && echo #!/usr/bin/env node > bin/ngjs.js && browserify --node --plugin=tsify -x lodash -x fs -x complete -x path -x prompt-sync src/main.ts --plugin [minifyify --no-map] >> bin/ngjs.js
scripts.start: mkdirp dist && watchify --debug --node --plugin=tsify -x lodash -x fs -x complete -x path -x prompt-sync src/main.ts -o dist/angularjs-cli.bundle.js -v

author: Steffen Kowalski <scipper@myscipper.de>
